item.title: Fuckit,imgoingbacktopaper!
item.description:
Youtube Link

And they said paper is oldschool. I say fuck them!

It’s been frustrating whole months that I didn’t draw anything substantially after I being laid off from animation industry. But tonight it will be different! I’m appeared to be at my home - where my light table was. I climbed up onto the top of my closet and bring it back to life. Thank goodness it’s still working!
